description: Facts and certain transport-related documents about the London Borough of Hammersmith & Fulham

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We partner with Hammersmith and Fulham to implement the Mayor's Transport Strategy in the borough."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP)"}

The LIP is produced by the London Borough of Hammersmith & Fulham and agreed with us. It sets out the details on transport infrastructure changes in a three-year period to support the Mayor's Transport Strategy .

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP) allocation 2019/20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/hammersmith-fulham-2019-20-lip-allocation-letter.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 220KB","image":{}},{"title":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP) confirmation letter 2017/18 - Borough Leader","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/1718-lip-confirmation-leader-letter-hammersmith-fulham.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 74KB","image":{}},{"title":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP) confirmation letter 2016/17","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/lip-funding-confirmation-letters-16-17-hammersmith-fulham.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 75KB","image":{}},{"title":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP) delivery plan letter","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/hammersmith-fulham-lip-delivery-plan-letter.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 70KB","image":{}},{"title":"Public Transport Access Levels - Hammersmith and Fulham","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/public-transport-access-levels-hammersmith-and-fulham.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 2.50MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Find out more about LIP funding.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"LIP targets for Hammersmith \u0026 Fulham"}
Each borough has set targets in their LIP against the Mayor's Transport Strategy outcomes - we track and report on progress against these targets in the LIP3 MTS outcomes borough data pack .
For example, the car ownership in the borough was 43,852 in 2017. The LIP target to reduce car ownership by 2041 is 43,700.
Residents in Hammersmith & Fulham made an average of 452,000 trips each day between 2015 and 2018 by:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Car and motorcycle: 18%","Tube /DLR: 14%","National Rail and London Overground: 3%","Bus/Tram: 15%","Taxi/Other: 1%","Cycle: 6%","Walking: 42%"]}
We also work with boroughs to encourage more cycling . We recorded 26,398 daily cycle trips on average starting in Hammersmith & Fulham between 2015 and 2018.
More resident and visitor population figures are on the GLA website.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Funding for your borough"}
We provide funding to boroughs and local communities for transport improvements in your local area.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Vision Zero"}

We are working with boroughs to reduce the number of deaths and serious injuries from all road collisions to zero by 2041. They are responsible for enforcing safe speeds on their roads, as well as leading community programmes to encourage using roads safely. Find out more about Vision Zero .
In 2017 there were 97 individuals killed or seriously injured in Hammersmith & Fulham. Our target for 2022 is to reduce this number to 66.
Find out more about collisions in your borough.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"What we're improving in Hammersmith \u0026 Fulham"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["We consult local communities on a range of projects every year - \u003ca href=\"https://consultations.tfl.gov.uk/consultation_finder/?advanced=1\u0026st=open\"\u003esearch on the TfL Consultation Hub\u003c/a\u003e ","Find out about \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events\"\u003emajor works and events near you\u003c/a\u003e ","To see some improvements in or near the borough, select 'Hammersmith \u0026 Fulham' under the Borough drop down on \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/improvements-and-projects/index\"\u003eImprovements \u0026 projects\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Work now going on in your borough includes:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eWood Lane to Notting Hill Gate cycle route\u003c/strong\u003e - we're developing proposals for a new cycle route that will connect key town centres including Wood Lane, Shepherd's Bush, Holland Park and Notting Hill. We're also looking to introduce \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/improvements-and-projects/cycle-superhighway-9\"\u003eCycleway 9 from Olympia to Hounslow\u003c/a\u003e ","\u003cstrong\u003eHammersmith Bridge refurbishment\u003c/strong\u003e - following the \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/hammersmith-bridge-closure\"\u003eclosure of the bridge to motorised traffic\u003c/a\u003e , we have agreed with the council on a plan for full refurbishment of the bridge"," \u003ca href=\"/modes/buses/improving-buses\"\u003estrong\u003c/a\u003e - only buses that meet or exceed Euro VI emissions standards are allowed in the Chiswick to Kensington High Street zones"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Bus network changes"}
From time to time - after consulting the public - we alter bus routes to reflect changing patterns in demand. We also make temporary changes, often because of road works. See the latest bus changes.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ)"}
To improve air quality the ULEZ will extend to Hammersmith & Fulham from October 2021 .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Our assets in Hammersmith \u0026 Fulham"}
Assets we maintain in your borough include:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["15 Tube stations","Three London Overground stations","Around 290 bus stops - \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps_/bus-spider-maps?Query=Hammersmith%20and%20Fulham\"\u003esee all 46 day bus routes in Hammersmith \u0026 Fulham\u003c/a\u003e ","Five bus stations","Three coach stops","61 Santander Cycles docking stations","Around 135 traffic signals","Over 6 kilometres of \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/red-routes/red-route-maps\"\u003ered routes\u003c/a\u003e "]}
See a map of our assets in London.
We maintain our assets until they need to be renewed or disposed of as set out in our asset management plan. We do this by:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Servicing them regularly to keep them operational","Repairing or replacing faulty assets"]}
Report a problem on a London street with our Streetcare tool .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"We do not maintain in Hammersmith \u0026 Fulham:"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Non-red route roads - these roads are maintained by \u003ca href=\"https://www.lbhf.gov.uk/\"\u003eHammersmith \u0026 Fulham\u003c/a\u003e ","Litter removal on red routes - this is also the borough's responsibility","Network Rail track at London Overground stations - \u003ca href=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/communities/contact-us/\"\u003econtact Network Rail\u003c/a\u003e ","Taxis and mini cabs - these are owned by \u003ca href=\"/modes/taxis-and-minicabs/what-to-expect-from-your-journey\"\u003etaxi drivers and minicab offices \u003c/a\u003e ","One coach stop on Hammersmith Road","One bus garage in Hammersmith \u0026 Fulham that is \u003ca href=\"/modes/buses/who-runs-your-bus\"\u003eowned and managed by a bus company\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/info-for/taxis-and-private-hire/taxi-ranks\"\u003eTaxi ranks\u003c/a\u003e on borough roads. Cars and other vehicles parked on taxi ranks can be \u003ca href=\"https://www.lbhf.gov.uk/parking/contact-us-about-parking\"\u003ereported to Hammersmith \u0026 Fulham\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Report private hire vehicles (PHVs) parked on ranks or unattended taxis on ranks directly to us.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Dealing with severe weather"}
For documents relating to winter service in the boroughs, go to the Streets publications page .
